name: DeployResult

fields.name: canceledBy
fields.description: ID of the user who canceled the queued deployment.

fields.name: canceledByName
fields.description: Full name of the user who canceled the queued deployment.

fields.name: checkOnly
fields.description: Indicates whether the deployment checked only the validity of the deployed files without making changes in the org. A check-only deployment does not deploy components or change the org in any way.

fields.name: completedDate
fields.description: Date and time for when the deployment process ended.

fields.name: createdBy
fields.description: ID of the user who created the deployment job.

fields.name: createdByName
fields.description: Full name of the user who created the deployment job.

fields.name: createdDate
fields.description: Date and time the deployment job was first queued.

fields.name: details
fields.description: Provides the details for components in a completed deployment.

fields.name: done
fields.description: Indicates whether Salesforce finished processing the deployment.

fields.name: errorMessage
fields.description: Message corresponding to the values in the errorStatusCode property, if any.

fields.name: errorStatusCode
fields.description: If an error occurs during deployment, a status code is returned. The message corresponding to the status code is returned in the errorMessagefield property.

fields.name: id
fields.description: ID of the deployment job.

fields.name: ignoreWarnings
fields.description: Specifies whether a deployment continues, even if the deployment generates warnings.

fields.name: lastModifiedDate
fields.description: Date and time of the last update for the deployment process.

fields.name: messages
fields.description: A list of all the detail messages for a deployment.

fields.name: numberComponentErrors
fields.description: The number of components that generated errors during the deployment.

fields.name: numberComponentsDeployed
fields.description: The number of components deployed in the deployment process. Use this value with the numberComponentsTotal property to get an estimate of the deployment’s progress.

fields.name: numberComponentsTotal
fields.description: The total number of components in the deployment. Use this value with the numberComponentsDeployed property to get an estimate of the deployment’s progress.

fields.name: rollbackOnError
fields.description: Indicates whether any failure causes a complete rollback (true) or not (false) of the deployment.

fields.name: startDate
fields.description: Date and time the deployment process began.

fields.name: stateDetail
fields.description: Indicates which component is being deployed.

fields.name: status
fields.description: Indicates the current state of the deployment.

fields.name: success
fields.description: Indicates whether the deployment was successful (true) or not (false).

methods.name: clone
methods.description: Makes a duplicate copy of the Metadata.DeployResult.

description: Represents the results of a metadata deployment.
